nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev + and - operations with safety checks that revert on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, reverts on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, reverts on overflow.
nodes.name: add

nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath64
@dev + and - operations with safety checks that revert on error for uint64

nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, reverts on overflow.
